projectList.title: poppyGP Player
highlights: Independently designed, developed, and deployed platform-agnostic, mobile-friendly, responsive AngularJS application with visitors from all timezones and continents
Alleviated 400% traffic spike in early stages by deploying an AWS EC2 instance, and succeded in migrating from previous webhost while maintenaning consistency of service
Configured dedicated media server and networking devices for RTMP video and audio streaming.
